lines.text: [MUSIC]
Last time on Gun City and the Temple of Tepenguin of Doom.
Our heroes awoke from a horrendous crash into the soy wastes
after narrowly escaping the Kinbone officers in Gadsven.
Greeting them were their adventurer pals Rex and Marie Stain
who nursed them back to health using the warm and voluminous yeti skin.
Leading them to the Wendig Station, the gang performed their tried and true method
of pretending to be arcade game repairmen to sneak on to the first class cabin.
Sullivan, stocking coach, befriended Leroy Peanutbutter and his 299 mice wives
and the one human one, and his larger hobo community of rejected Ken Bones and Robins.
Sullivan was asked to sneak up front and bring back real food for these less fortunate, and he accepted the task more or less.
Meanwhile, the party ran into their old friend Gary C. Enterprise, who introduced them to the newfound wealth they received from the cold dogs and hot soda business.
Also, they finally met Snoochie Boochies, who it turns out is the last of the Tamagotchis, and wishes to restore his people, using the N-word pass.
boys agreed to help him and trick their benefactor, Leo the Collector, into receiving a phony
pass after they get the real one for Snoochy Boochies.
Finally, after the Ken Bone officers tried and tried to kidnap the boys, Sullivan the
Frog's terrible stealth abilities led to their undoing and an ambush that may end their lives
once and for all.
